programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP02) After a veteran of a brutal North African battle is slain by a sword, Detective Murdoch's prime suspect is the victim's fellow soldier, who is none other than Winston Churchill.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree)

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
Founded by Harold and Audrey Zettl, Harvest Community Inc. provides unique employment opportunities for individuals with a disability in Saskatchewan.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S03EP01) In this episode of Dish with Mary, Mary meets Chef Louie Lui, a renowned chef hailing from Hong Kong. Chef Louie shares the journey of how he came to Winnipeg and how he brought traditional Hong Kong flavours to the city.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S06EP03) After a judge is intimidated into releasing two gunrunners, Bill recruits an old friend to help him track the criminals down. Abigail and Lucas clash over the saloon's late hours. Carson and Faith must decide whether to pursue their feelings.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary LeVeaux-Coulter) Kavan Smith (Leland Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: Shifting Gears: Autonomous Vehicles
programme.desc:
Alex Smyth explores the latest developments and research being done with autonomous vehicles in Canada, learning about what the future holds for cars, cities and mobility.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Evening the Odds
programme.desc:
Evening the Odds is a documentary on gender equity in sport, with a specific look at the situation within para sport in Canada. We talk with researchers to learn what needs to be done to make sport a level playing field for all genders.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S13EP10) When a whiskey baron and his family are murdered Murdoch puts Parker in the cells with a hitman to see who hired him.
Année : 2008

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Ness Murby - Transcending
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) Ness and Eva have a week of celebrations that include their 10th wedding anniversary and Ness' one-year anniversary on testosterone. Their excitement is dramatically cut short when they become the victims of a heartbreaking crime.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S01EP01) Melissa is a vibrant, young woman who's just finished college and started her career. But since graduation, her body and style have changed.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Frankie Drake: détective privée
programme.desc:
(S04EP09) Mary looks into a morality violation by Rita Hart's modern dance troupe and Frankie questions if they've brought the Spanish flu to Toronto.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc:
(S13EP06) Georgie's graduation has finally arrived, but so has a mysterious figure from her past.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2017

Evening the Odds is a documentary on gender equity in sport, with a specific look at the situation within para sport in Canada. We talk with researchers to learn what needs to be done to make sport a level playing field for all genders.
Année : 2017

programme.title: The Achieveables
programme.desc:
A group of adventurers with disabilities spend three challenging days on the Kootenay River, known for its wild rapids, moody weather and stunning scenery. The Achievables is a story or tenacity, community, pain and triumph in the face of obstacles.
Année : 2017

programme.title: The Invincible James Lee
programme.desc:
James Lee is a husband, father, avid athlete, and is about to become a double amputee. Follow James on his journey, from early doctor's appointments to the surgery room and eventual recovery.
Année : 2017

programme.desc:
